mapper.select: SELECT A.NO ,A.CATEGORY ,A.CORP ,A.PROJECT_TITLE ,A.PROJECT_INTRO ,A.START_DATE ,A.END_DATE ,A.CONTENTS ,A.ETC1 ,A.ETC2 ,A.RESULT ,A.USE_YN ,A.DEL_YN ,A.LIST_ORDER ,B.FILE_NO ,B.REF_NO ,B.FILE_EXPLAIN ,B.FILE_STORED_NAME FROM PORTFOLIO A LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES B ON A.NO = B.REF_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.LIST_ORDER ASC
SELECT A.CATEGORY, A.INTRODUCE FROM ABOUT A
SELECT A.NO, A.TITLE, A.SUB_TITLE, A.INTRODUCE, A.LIST_ORDER FROM INTRODUCE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.LIST_ORDER ASC
